argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_issqf | |- ( A e. NN -> ( ( mmu ` A ) =/= 0 <-> A. p e. Prime ( p pCnt A ) <_ 1 ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_biimpa | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ ( mmu ` A ) =/= 0 ) -> A. p e. Prime ( p pCnt A ) <_ 1 ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( p = P -> ( p pCnt A ) = ( P pCnt A ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_breq1d | |- ( p = P -> ( ( p pCnt A ) <_ 1 <-> ( P pCnt A ) <_ 1 ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_rspccv | |- ( A. p e. Prime ( p pCnt A ) <_ 1 -> ( P e. Prime -> ( P pCnt A ) <_ 1 ) ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ ( mmu ` A ) =/= 0 ) -> ( P e. Prime -> ( P pCnt A ) <_ 1 ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_3impia | |- ( ( A e. NN /\ ( mmu ` A ) =/= 0 /\ P e. Prime ) -> ( P pCnt A ) <_ 1 ) |
